SEARCH
Package model

Class CommandCenter

java.lang.Object
model.CommandCenter
public class CommandCenter extends Object
The CommandCenter class manages the state of the game, including the player's resources, plants, zombies, bullets, and game levels. It also controls game-related actions like playing music and managing plant placement.

      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • zombieCrossYard

      public static void zombieCrossYard()
      Handles the event when zombies cross the yard. Stops the current music and plays the game over sound.

    • getLevel

      public static int getLevel()
      Returns the current game level.
      Returns:
      The current level.

    • addLevel

      public static void addLevel()
      Increases the game level by one.

    • setLevel

      public static void setLevel(int n)
      Sets the game level to the specified value. Also changes the background music if the level changes.
      Parameters:
      n - The new level.

    • getScore

      public static long getScore()
      Returns the player's current score.
      Returns:
      The player's score.

    • setScore

      public static void setScore(long lParam)
      Sets the player's score to the given value.
      Parameters:
      lParam - The new score.

    • addScore

      public static void addScore(long lParam)
      Adds the specified amount to the player's score. Increases the game level if the score reaches a multiple of 300.
      Parameters:
      lParam - The amount to add to the score.

    • playMusic

      public static void playMusic()
      Plays background music after a delay.

    • clearMovTemp

      public static void clearMovTemp()
      Clears the temporary plant list and resets planting status.

    • minusSunCredit

      public static void minusSunCredit(long lParam)
      Deducts the specified amount from the player's sun credits. Ensures the sun credits do not fall below zero.
      Parameters:
      lParam - The amount to deduct.

    • setPlant

      public static void setPlant(int type)
      Sets the type of plant to be placed and updates the plant object.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of plant (0 for regular, 1 for ice).

    • setPlantPosition

      public static void setPlantPosition(Point newPoint)
      Updates the position of the plant being placed.
      Parameters:
      newPoint - The new position of the plant.

    • setPaused

      public static void setPaused(boolean isPaused)
      Pauses or resumes the game.
      Parameters:
      isPaused - True to pause the game, false to resume.

    • isPaused

      public static boolean isPaused()
      Returns whether the game is currently paused.
      Returns:
      True if the game is paused, false otherwise.

    • isPlaying

      public static boolean isPlaying()
      Returns whether the game is currently playing.
      Returns:
      True if the game is playing, false otherwise.

      Sets whether the game is currently playing.
